title: #307 - Henri Bergson, Time and Free Will
itunes:title: #307 - Henri Bergson, Time and Free Will
description: This episode is going to require some imagination, some creativity, and some intuition on the part of the listener. Connor and Dan aren't quite sure they understand what Henri Bergson is talking about, but they like the cut of his jib and they like the way he makes them feel. Sometimes that's good enough.
